question: Which institution has commissioned a study to examine the economic impact of the verdicts given to preserve environment?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s apex think-tank NITI Aayog has commissioned a study to examine the economic impact of the verdicts given to preserve environment.
The study is to be performed by the CUTS (Consumer Unity and Trust Society) centre. It will examine five major projects that are impacted by the judicial decisions of the Supreme Court or the National Green Tribunal.
